Texts.Chs: 把^orange;精制酒^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;spirits^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 干得好！现在让我们来学习最后一项知识吧！
Texts.Eng: Nice work! Now, we'll have one last recipe to do.

Texts.Chs: 那*嗝*么，你要利用这些捣碎的水果制作^green;精制酒^white;。除了此之外，你还需要^orange;糖^reset;和^orange;酵母水^reset;还有^orange;水^reset;。把所有材料放到^green;蒸馏器^reset;开始酿造吧！*嗝*
Texts.Eng: So *hic* with all these mashed fruits we're ready to make some ^green;shpirits^white;. You'll need some ^orange;Yeast Water^reset; and ^orange;Water^reset; too. Bring all to the ^green;distiller^reset; and do yer magic! *hic*
